name: Barbie Wodtka
text: Absolute best place for pizza, wings, salads, and subs! Never had a bad experience and if there is a problem they have always taken care of it! Love the place and the employees that work there!

name: curtisscott02
text: love them we order from monkens and they are the best great pizza and great deals!!!! Brady and the bunch are incredible!! It is rare to find a pizza place with great food but even better service!!! Super friendly and accommodating! Beat all the other pizza places by 10 miles...truly!

name: alissha marcum
text: Okay order a pizza just one a salad got my free movie go to pick it up well I got the pizza the salad but no movie called up there at 9:20 hey I didn't get my movie. You see if it was up there of course it was and the guy said that he would â€¦More

name: Trisha Briggs
text: Still the best salad you can get in this town, always fresh veggies, generous toppings, several cheese choices and the croutons are DELISH! Pizza is great, too. Just ordered with buy any pizza, get one free!!

name: gregg schwartz
text: The workers here are always friendly, the food quality is consistent and delicious! The crust toppings are just an added bonus!

name: Ronald Boettcher
text: Great place to get authentic pizza and also subs, salads, and wings. Love it.

name: Schultheis Productions
text: Great pizza, prices are right and the staff is nice

name: Michelle Lundegreen
text: They just placed the presoaked mushrooms on  precooked pizza and they slid off soon as picked up a piece. Dough was under cooked. Ordered bbq chicken pizza minus red onions, was loaded with them! Worst experience we've ever had from them! Usually, they are our go-to pizza place. NOT ANY MOREðŸ˜¡.

name: Haley Aud
text: Best thin crust pizza, i usually get good pricing options here.

name: ivan mcconnaughay
text: Two pizzas 40 dollars! When u can get the same pizzas for less then 16 at dominoes and dominoes tastes better! They charged me 2 dollars extra for green peppers and there was literaly two little slices. They asked us y we havent been there â€¦More

name: Belinda Schuchmann
text:
Her dad I took her to make a one topping pizza and a cartoon she had a blast now she thinks she's a top notch pizza maker
Thank you for making her have an awesome day

name: Gnu Brown
text: We order at least 5 or more times a month for sum fawkn reason they can't get address right, let alone get our order right on a one topping pizza! Only way ill have if sum1 buys or all other pizza joints out of business!!

name: Dustin Smith
text: Excellent pizza. If you order ask about crust toppers.

name: Ruthann Talbert
text: We was looking for a sequel, they said would let us know when it comes back into store.

name: BBrading1
text: Fast delivery and the Pizza and Subs were Great! Very friendly!

name: Neon Skating
text: There is 1 women employee that is very rude
